There were no other sightings in Asheville on or around November 11th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsSitting in the jacuzzi at 8PM EST, saw a very bright, yellow light falling for about 15 seconds in the west, then disappearing. Noticed it because it was brighter than the brightest star and falling straight down.
Summary: Saw a bright yellowish light, brighter than a star falling straight down then disappearing above the horizon.
